path.style: stroke: var(--color-surface, #FFFFFF); stroke-width: 10; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round

polyline.style: stroke: var(--color-surface, #FFFFFF); stroke-width: 14; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round
stroke: var(--color-primary, #0A3D62); stroke-width: 10; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round
